Class BluetoothScanner

java.lang.Object
android.content.BroadcastReceiver
com.esplibrary.bluetooth.BluetoothScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
IScanner
public class BluetoothScanner extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver implements IScanner
Scans for V1's.

    • scanForDevice

      public boolean scanForDevice(String addy, ConnectionType type)
      Description copied from interface: IScanner
      Asynchronously scans for a BluetoothDevice with the MAC address == address.
      Specified by:
      scanForDevice in interface IScanner
      Parameters:
      addy - The address to scan for.
      type - The type of the BluetoothDevice.
      Returns:
      True if the device scan has been started.

      Description copied from interface: IScanner

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      type - Connection type to scan. Note ConnectionType.Demo is not a valid scan type
      Returns:

    • isV1Connection

      public static final boolean isV1Connection(String name)
      Helper method for determining if a BluetoothDevice is a V1.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the BluetoothDevices to scan if it a V1.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the BluetoothDevices is a V1.
